Line45.6DE47: We will never see each other again.
Line43.6DE47: Wish me well, Lorath. Because if everything works out as I am hoping...
Line37.6DE47: I know you don’t want to hear this, but you don’t get to quit. Not again.
Line35.6DE47: If I’ve misjudged, the world is going to need you to survive and clean up the mistakes I leave behind.
VoiceDir1.6DE47: Neyrelle voiceover throughout as letter is read.
Line13.6DE47: It’s hard for me to think about her right now. But then I remember you and Donan. You weren’t “all-knowing Horadrim.”
Line17.6DE47: That’s what I hold onto because there is so much further to go.
Line33.6DE47: But people have already died because I was not careful enough. I can’t risk you too.
Line11.6DE47: I don’t know if she’d recognize this person I’m becoming.
Line47.6DE47: You were bitter. You were uncertain.
Line15.6DE47: But you were always true friends.
Line19.6DE47: Your imperfection gave me hope. And we will need it to face what comes next.
Line1.6DE47: I spent a lot of time learning this code, so I hope you remember how to read it, Lorath. Because you are the last Horadrim now.
Line27.6DE47: I don’t know how much time I have, but there has to be a better answer. And I have to find it. Alone.
Line7.6DE47: My mother would have wanted me to stay with you. She believed the Horadrim had all the answers.
Line31.6DE47: I know you’ll want to go with me.
